author: Jeffery Martin
title: Florida Gov. Suggests He'll Enforce Stricter COVID-19 Measures If White House Recommends Stay-at-Home
description: "If any of those task force folks tell me that we should do X, Y or Z," DeSantis said Tuesday, "of course we're going to consider it."
content:
Florida Governor Ron DeSantis said during a press conference on Tuesday that he would consider issuing a stay at home order for his state if it were specifically recommended by the White House coronavirus task force.
So far, DeSantis has only issued a stay a… [+2631 chars]
